name: front-loader
description: Small Node.js app that loads a large list of contacts from a JSON file into a HTML dropdown component
author: Adrien Valcke

scripts.daemon: PORT=${PORT:-2000} && (NODE_ENV=test PORT=$PORT node ./app/index.js &) && echo "starting app with Node at localhost:$PORT" && sleep 15 && curl --silent localhost:$PORT 1> /dev/null && echo "app running at localhost:$PORT" || (echo "app failed starting, exiting" && exit 1)
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.stop: kill $(ps aux | grep '[n]ode ./app/index.js' | awk '{print $2}') 2> /dev/null && echo "app at localhost:${PORT:-2000} stopped" || (echo "trying to stop process but no node process found related to current app" && exit 1)
